resources.string: Pick a duration between 10 s and 120 s
Pick rest duration between 1 s and 120 s
Complete a session in Metronome to start seeing them here

ABOUT VESTIBIO 
 

The Vestibio App was intially developed for my mother who suffered from a vestibular disorder/vertigo which required VRT (Vestibular Rehabilitation Therapy) to recover. This app helped her perform daily exercises without having to keep track or reps, sets or resting durations, which in turn allowed her to focus on performing the exercises correctly and with ease.
 
 Vestibo is a tool to help those who have similar vestibular therapy prescribed to them to do at home by their health care providers. It's also a tool which can be used by health care professionals such as vestibular specialists to help their patients perform exercises both in a medical environment and at home. The types of exercises this app can assist with are VOR (Vestibular Ocular Reflex) exercises, gaze stabilization exercises and any others which require a metronome to perform consistently.
